entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't call setters in same way reflection based ConfigurationBinder does #96873
    9.0.0
  • [monovm] Assertion at object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96872
    8.0.x
  • [wasm][wasi] No main function should be required when building a library #96869
  • iOS NativeAOT testing app failing to build in performance pipeline #96868
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: OOM when compiling `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.dll` #96866
  • [wasm] AOT: System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests - aot-instances.dll with exit code 137 #96865
  • [wasm] `NativeLibrary` doesn't include file #96864
  • [wasm] Setting `WasmBuildNative` to false produces no output wasm binary #96863
  • [wasm][wasi] incorrecly adds imports that aren't needed #96862
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute model for feature APIs #96859
  • ILLink doesn't keep most specific static default interface method #96855
  • ILLink doesn't keep static default interface method for uninstantiated types #96854
  • [wasm] UnmanagedCallersOnly generates incorrect wasm export types #96853
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Gauge metric creation should support async callback signature #96850
  • Request for Implementation of DbException.SqlState and DbException.IsTransient in System.Data.Odbc #96849
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Creating Opposite SearchValues #96844
  • [browser][AOT] wasm-ld : error : initial memory too small #96840
    9.0.0
  • The StringBuilder.Append(Char[], Int32, Int32) method call throws the System.ArgumentOutOfRange exception in a valid situation when the app targets .NET 8 and built in the Release configuration #96839
  • Profiled casts: isinst is no longer hoisted #96837
  • Unexpected reordering of memory allocation when using GC.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread() when running optimized #96836
  • build mono failed "warning d9025 overriding '/EHa' with '/EHa-'" #96832
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in LINQ #96852
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #96851
  • MethodDef validation seems miss to validate the last arg in `validateTokenSig` #96831
  • [libs][iOS] AdvSimdEncode hits PlatformNotSupportedException #96828
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity memory footprint concern #96822
    Future

Closed

  • Strong type support in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #61947
    Future
  • Enable Remaining Libraries Tests in TestReadyToRun Pipeline #95928
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect method return on Android in Release mode #96264
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` - `aot-instances.dll with exit code 137` #96631
  • Trimmed winforms app crashes #96516
  • [hot reload] Could not parse field signature 0a0008a9 due to: Could not resolve type with token 010001f3 from typeref #90332
    8.0.0
  • DAC fails to enumerate heap objects on .NET 7+ due to GC Regions #96568
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: KMAC #93494
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !"Debugger doesn't support OOM scenarios." #12990
    Future
  • Building clr subset emits tons of command line warnings #68658
    9.0.0
  • [OCSP Stapling] OCSP Reponse has expired in .NET Linux #95567
    7.0.x
  • RemoveAllKeyed Requires Equality Operator #95754
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0.1: No symbols for osx-arm64 Mono #96845
  • `TraceUtils.CopyStringDictionary()` is broken #96092
    9.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync() does not work on Mac #90258
  • [MT][browser] `WithExecutionMode` fails #91661
    9.0.0
  • Add test for LTTng config parser #12994
    Future
  • Numerous GlobalizationNative P/Invokes in System.Private.CoreLib.dll don't have a corresponding native function anymore #96251
    9.0.0
  • Introduce an R2R File Format change that can contain multiple assemblies #12967
    Future
  • Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration* tests failing in CI #48798
    Future
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies #96736

PullRequests

Created

  • TryAddEnumerable test avoid false negatives #96871
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Preserve debug info for merged returns #96870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove IBC and Ngen related structures and comments #96867
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96861
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Remove helperframe marshal #96860
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add non-portable RID to list of known runtime packs instead of overwriting #96858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change allocation of `MethodData` structures to do less unnecessary work #96857
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Ensure that JSON properties can be skipped without buffering their entire contents. #96856
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix concurrency issue in TypeDescriptor GetProperties() and GetConverter() #96846
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Optimize BigInteger.CompareTo() #96835
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix processing `--substitutions` #96834
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [libs] Skip AdvSimdEncode on Mono #96829
    area-System.Buffers
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96825
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add ActiveIssue Annotations to Failing TestReadyToRun Tests and Reenable the Executables #96721
    disabled-test, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #96788
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move arm64 insOpts entries into insScalableOpts #96692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Detect static default interface methods in illink #96821
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Hoist in newly recognized loops #96753
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • Remove NDirectWriteableData #96824
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent access violation in ThreadExceptionState::EnumChainMemoryRegions #96823
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change ampere queue name #96803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Slightly improve profiled casts #96731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] Test for: set breakpoint in partial class defined in separate files #96735
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enable MT in S.Linq.Parallel #96215
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • STJ/JsonPropertyDictionary: eagerly initialize _propertyDictionary if known capacity #96769
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] - CancellationToken for JSWebWorker #96696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96669
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Add entire issuer chain to trusted X509_STORE when stapling OCSP_Response #96792
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Reduce asm size of CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan #96773
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Do not include `NativeSinks.NativeAot.cs` without `FeaturePerfTracing` #96811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move setting variables to HelixPreCommands #96713
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable EventSource manifest gen tests on stress runs. #96816
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96800
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Align newly recognized loops #96756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll newly recognized loops #96752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone newly recognized loops #96754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update snapcraft.yaml for jan releases #96418
    area-Snap
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #96817
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A to IF_SVE_HT_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #96744
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
